    • Method Detail

      • getRestrictedPoint

        public java.awt.Point getRestrictedPoint(java.awt.Point cursor)
        Find the appropriate vertex to add when creating a shape, relative to the cursor and in accordance with geometric rules. Once the shape exceeds numFreelyDrawnPoints vertices, this method will be called to find the appropriate vertex. For Ellipse, points will form a parallelogram, which will represent the ends of each axis.
        Specified by:
        getRestrictedPoint in class Shape
        Parameters:
        cursor - Point with the coordinates of the cursor
        Returns:
        A vertex that conforms to the geometric rules of the shape

        public java.lang.String toString()
